dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7899 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 75 Commerce Drive in Grayslake, Illinois, as the “Army Specialist Joseph Joey W. Dimock II Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 75 Commerce Drive in Grayslake, Illinois, as the Army Specialist Joseph Joey W. Dimock II Post Office Building.

section.header: Army Specialist Joseph Joey W. Dimock II Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 75 Commerce Drive in Grayslake, Illinois, shall be known and designated as the Army Specialist Joseph Joey W. Dimock II Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Army Specialist Joseph Joey W. Dimock II Post Office Building.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives November 14, 2022.
